title: Jhin's german voice over is incomplete
body:
The german voice over of Jhin lacks the background chorus unlike any other localization. [Here is a video of the german sound files](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2st8gjPZAE4). Skip to the middle of the video and listen to the background music. It's like ... just some generic noise from a syntesizer.

Here is a (hopefully) complete list of localizations:

* [English](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QwQ3i9L0j74)
* [French](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=58YS12t61gg)
* [Spanish](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qqu4KLXRgB0)
* [Latin American Spanish](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-efB4JS0RqY)
* [Italian](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6heL1G1pULc)
* [Czech](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B3N-VKxPX0w)
* [Russian](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZYXPabG1olk)
* [Romanian](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1p1ZyMbOnME)
* [Japanese](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OualIRBLvOc)
* [Brazilian Portuguese](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HpGbyoF631U)
* [Turkish](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BCTdKQ6wvhg)
* [Korean](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w5S8fFhLbZQ)
* [Greek](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y1WLKECI86E)
* [Polish](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z5DkjOXar9Q)
* [Hungarian](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sihVTueifJo)

So **out of 16** languages **only** the german one hasn't got this awesome chorus. It's a real bummer. Jhin is one of the best champions quality wise in SFX and the music department has made a lot of effort to make this happen.
And in german only Riot failed to make the voice over ... perfect.

Please fix this. :(

replies.body:
Heya hastalaIsta! 

Thanks for the awesome bug report! We'll take a look and see what's going on here!
Any news on this? I wanted to report this exact thing but found this thread instead. The choros, like from the other languages, is still missing in german.
